titles.title: CARES Act of 2017
CARES Act of 2017
Creating Access to Rehabilitation for Every Senior Act of 2017

To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to eliminate the 3-day prior hospitalization requirement for Medicare coverage of skilled nursing facility services in qualified skilled nursing facilities, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary:
Creating Access to Rehabilitation for Every Senior Act of 2017 or the CARES Act of 2017
This bill eliminates the three-day prior-hospitalization requirement for Medicare coverage of certain skilled-nursing-facilities services. The Medicare Payment Advisory Commission must study the cost of impact of such elimination.
